thread.title: BRIEF-Tahoe Reports Fuel Spill At La Arena Mine Spill Fully Contained

title: BRIEF-Tahoe Reports Fuel Spill At La Arena Mine Spill Fully Contained

organizations.name: brief-tahoe reports fuel spill at la arena mine spi

text:
April 9, 2018 / 1:20 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Tahoe Reports Fuel Spill At La Arena Mine Spill Fully Contained Reuters Staff 
April 9 (Reuters) - Tahoe Resources Inc: 
* TAHOE REPORTS FUEL SPILL AT LA ARENA MINE; SPILL FULLY CONTAINED 
* IS ESTIMATED THAT APPROXIMATELY 300 TO 500 GALLONS OF DIESEL FUEL LEFT LA ARENA’S CONTAINMENT FACILITIES * PRODUCTION IS NOT EXPECTED TO BE IMPACTED BY THIS EVENT 
* FUELED ONE OF DIESEL STORAGE TANKS, SPILLING INTO CONTAINMENT FACILITIES 
* CONTAINMENT DRAIN VALVE HAD BEEN LEFT OPEN AT LA ARENA MINE BY FUEL VENDOR DUE TO CONTINUING RAINS 
* REPORTS A FUEL SPILL AT LA ARENA MINE IN PERU LATE APRIL 6TH * UP PROTOCOLS 
* INITIAL INSPECTIONS CONFIRM FUEL SPILL AT LA ARENA MINE WAS CONTAINED WITHIN CO’S PROPERTY AND DID NOT REVEAL ANY REPORTED IMPACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
